desc.en: Configure ioBroker for Swissglider --> upload/download deviceConfiguration / set Swissglider Tags / change influxDB names
desc.de: ioBroker für Swissglider konfigurieren --> Gerät hochladen/herunterladenKonfiguration / Swissglider Tags setzen / influxDB-Namen ändern

desc.pt: Configurar ioBroker para Swissglider -> upload / download deviceConfiguration / set Swissglider Tags / change influxDB names
